formalpara.title: Define the usage models to be developed
formalpara.para: Use the Usage Specification to define the usage models to be elaborated, and the scope and purpose of each.

glossdef.para: Include special purpose models as necessary (e.g. for certification of infrequently used functions with high consequences of failure).
Consider use of actual user input when available. Realtime data feeds or the output of automated usage capture facilities can be used as components of usage models.
